video_title: The Ultimate Guide to Building Million Dollar Agencies

content_profile.title: The Ultimate Guide to Building Million Dollar Agencies

key_takeaways: Solution: Use product-market fit signals and systematic evaluation (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Product Hunt launches for new services (Channel: content)
Strategy: Product studio model - building multiple companies under one holding company
Strategy: Use international (non-US) designers and AI-enhanced productivity to reduce costs

startup_ideas.title: Design subscription service using international talent and AI
startup_ideas.business_model: fixed monthly subscription for unlimited design requests
startup_ideas.validation: four new subscriptions in one week

market_gaps.title: Knowing when to cut or invest more in projects
market_gaps.solution_approach: Use product-market fit signals and systematic evaluation

trend_opportunities.title: Product studios as the future of building startups
trend_opportunities.opportunity: building multiple companies systematically rather than single startup bets

supporting_comments: You gotta make it a recurring thing like Andrew Wilkinson on MFM!

comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Strong audience demand for consistent business content creation
